objects.text:
• Sleek aluminum frame design
• High-capacity battery system
• Advanced disc brake system
• Front suspension for rough terrain

product_details.name: Alpine X-Power: Premium Electric Mountain Bike with Ultra Performance
product_details.description:
• Sleek white aluminum frame design with premium build quality
• High-capacity integrated battery system for extended range
• Advanced disc brake system for superior stopping power
• Premium wide-grip mountain bike tires for all-terrain performance
• Electric pedal assist system with multiple power modes
• Ergonomic saddle and handlebar design for maximum comfort
• Front suspension fork for smooth riding on rough terrain
• Heavy-duty drivetrain with multiple gear options
• Modern LCD display for speed and battery monitoring
• Weatherproof construction for all-season riding
• Quick-release wheels for easy maintenance and transport
• Professional-grade components for durability and reliability

banner_details:
This dynamic product banner features a bold, futuristic layout divided into four vibrant quadrants, showcasing a modern electric mountain bike. The design includes a high-resolution product image (`product_image`) prominently placed on the right half, adding emphasis to the bike. The left panel contains stacked text layers: a primary heading (`heading`), stylized subheading (`subheading`), and a sleek tagline (`tagline`) describing the product category. Below, a features list (`description`) highlights the bike's key attributes in bullet form. The price (`price`) is displayed in large font beside an eye-catching call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled with `cta`.

The background includes overlapping geometric shapes, soft radial gradients, and diagonal lines for added tech aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #0A2A43
- Steel Blue: #0F3A5F
- Azure Blue: #4BBEFF
- Sky Blue: #378DC1
- Light Blue: #2D679F
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek electric bike with a modern and aerodynamic design, featuring a minimalistic color palette that emphasizes sophistication and power. The primary colors are cool metallic silver (#D5D5D5) on the frame, deep matte black (#1A1A1A) on the tires, battery, and mechanical parts, and subtle accents of gunmetal gray (#4B4B4B) throughout the detailing. The disk brakes and metal components introduce hints of steel gray (#757575), providing contrast and depth. These hues are well-blended to create a cohesive look while bold blacks help to highlight functional parts. This palette suits clean, tech-inspired banner designs with a premium feel.
